txt.en: 'Are you looking to be welcomed into the inner circle of Thorin's Hall? I can help you with that and make you a \qKindred\q to Thorin's Hall.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon you will be Kindred to Thorin's Hall. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered Kindred to Thorin's Hall.
